plot: A female cyclist faces a grueling challenge of physical and emotional obstacles. But she finds that she is not alone on her path. "To lead people, walk beside them." Lao-tsu, Chinese philosopher (c. 4th-6th century BC).
title: The Last Mile
plot_es: A female cyclist faces a grueling challenge of physical and emotional obstacles. But she finds that she is not alone on her path. "To lead people, walk beside them." Lao-tsu, Chinese philosopher (c. 4th-6th century BC).
plot_en: A female cyclist faces a grueling challenge of physical and emotional obstacles. But she finds that she is not alone on her path. "To lead people, walk beside them." Lao-tsu, Chinese philosopher (c. 4th-6th century BC).
